title: Kevin Hart Is Terrified of Robert Irwin's Animals

json.text: -What animals did you bring for us tonight?
I'm starting off with something very cute and cuddly.
-It's an ostrich. It's a baby ostrich.
Her name's Giselle. Look at her.
Do you want to come pet her? -What is that noise?
-Yeah, well, the babies, they make this little chirping noise.
"I want some little black man." [ Laughter ]
-That is -- Now, how old is this baby?
But they'll grow to be the biggest
and most powerful bird on the planet.
They can go 40 miles an hour.
-At this time, I want to say,
I will not be the fastest thing running.
[ Laughter ] I'm definitely gonna get caught.
-Come on in, come on in, pet her.
-I don't need to pet her. I can see it, that's cool.
I can see it from here. [ Laughter ]
-Isn't she amazing? So, these little ones,
they actually -- they have to be really tough and strong,
because anything would try to eat these in the wild.
So they have to be really good at fending for themselves.
And those legs, that's where they get all the power.
They can easily kill a lion with those legs.
[ Laughter ] But once they reach full size --
Aren't they just amazing? They're remarkable creatures.
Are you sure you don't -- -Did you bring anything else?
You can put that one back. [ Laughter ]
That was really good. So for this one --
-Are they all coming out from this side?
-No, no. Some are coming from this side.
-All right. No, we won't surprise you.
Kevin. -It's all good, it's all good.
-It's all good. -All right, for this one,
Jimmy, I want you to come around, as well.
I want you to come around to the front.
Let's all stand up for this one.
This is LeBron, and LeBron is absolutely awesome.
So, all right. Come on out, LeBron.
-No, stay, Kevin, no! We're in it together, man.
-Kevin, you have to just get over your fears.
You have to hold the snake.
-You can hold him. He is so nice.
And get over your fears. -Come on in.
-Come in, Kevin, come in! Come in!
-Dude, Kevin, just close your eyes and trust me.
You'll do fine. -Let Jimmy do it first.
Go ahead, Jimmy. You do it first.
Come on in. We've got another one.
Come on, man. [ Cheers and applause ]
Kevin, if I do it, you got to do it.
-So this is LeBron and Elvis. -Aha. Ah.
Now, how awesome is that? That's perfect.
-He'll just glide right through your hands.
So, now Jimmy's -- Jimmy's on it.
He is amazing. Kevin, it's your turn now.
-They're the coolest snakes. They really are.
-Just try it. Please, just do it.
-Let me tell you what I've gotten really good at
-Jimmy, you hold it. It looks good.
-You know how to deal with big snakes.
-Have you seen his Tommy Johns ad?
You got take a look at this picture.
You'll see what I'm talking about.
All right, he's not gonna do it. -Just pat them.
-Does it -- Does it -- Do they bite?
-I was about to do it. Did you see me?
I was about to go. -Yeah, no, all right.
They're not venomous, but they can easily
take down a venomous snake, no problem at all.
-Is there a chance that it could bite me?
-How about this? You do the next animal.
-You do the next one. -It's gonna be worse.
I'd rather try this. -It won't be worse.
-It's not gonna crawl up me? -It's not gonna crawl.
-I'll just hold it in my hand. -Yeah, put your hands out.
-If it start moving, come get the snake.
-I'll fight you, man. I will fight you.
I promise you, I'mma a swing on you
if you don't get the snake.
-So, what I do? So, I'mma go stand?
-Yep. So you can stand right here
and then put your hands out.
I'll be with you the whole way.
-Hey, man, on my mother, if this snake...
-So, put your hands out like that.
-My snake's getting weird. -I can't do it, I can't do it.
-I can't do it, Jimmy. -Next one, next one.
Next one. We'll try the next one.
-Y'all saw me try, guys. I tried. I'm sorry.
-My snake stopped moving, so I'm getting --
Love them so much. Thank you.
I got so much sweat dripping down my ass right now.
All right, all right, here we go.
All right, what do we have? What's the next thing?
Kevin, get up here. Get up here.
You have to, come on. Trust me.
Get up here, dude. -I'm so nervous.
-You can sit down for this one. -Sit down for this.
I'll stay with you. Come on.
-It's cute, it's fluffy. This one's little.
Please, come on. -Go on that side.
-I don't like how y'all trapping me.
I feel like y'all trying to close me in.
Go here. Let me go right here.
-All right. So, for this one, though...
Kevin, you can hold this one. -Okay.
-But for this one, I just need to make sure
and don't move too much for this one.
And also, don't breathe on it too much,
-Close your eye, close your eye. -You'll be fine.
it don't sound like this is the animal for me.
I don't think this is the one that --
He's handled a similar species. -Yeah, I got it.
-Close your eyes, put your hands out.
-No, it won't come from behind, I promise.
-Get it out and let me see it. -Okay.
-No, no, no! Don't -- No, no, no.
Just close your eyes, and please, Kevin --
-Don't get behind me. Don't get behind me.
I'm just saying, if you close your eyes
-This is how black people die in a horror movie.
I'll telling you what. Just go like that
and he's gonna put something fluffy on your hand.
-I got to see it, brother. I got to see it.
It's not in me. I'm sorry.
Physically, I'm not capable of processing
what you're saying right now. [ Laughter ]
I love you, and it's your birthday.
Just pull it out. Let me see what it is first.
It's got the cutest little face, little beady eyes.
-Okay, go, go, go. Let's see what --
Is it fast? -No, no, not at all.
Her name's Big Red, and she is adorable.
She's my favorite -- my favorite animal tonight.
-Jimmy, what's taking him so long over there, Jimmy?
-So, this is Big Red. [ Audience gasps ]
-No, no, no. No, no, no, no. No.
You better stay your ass over there, man.
-He's 14 years old. -Hey, I don't care, Jimmy.
-Come on in. -That look like it jump.
Yeah, that ain't gonna happen for me, bro.
They're the most amazing spider ever.
They are my favorite. They're so cool.
So, now what you want do is... -Oh.
-...if you want, you can put your hands out.
So put both hands out there on the desk.
She loves you. -Oh, Jimmy, I'm nervous for you.
[ Laughter ] I'm nervous for you, man.
-Be quiet, be quiet. -Is it -- Is it --
Is it, like, the loud noises, what would it do?
-Oh, my gosh. Do not even make a loud noise.
-As long as you don't breathe on it or anything, you'll be good.
-It's just that breath that they don't like.
He's not gonna know whether it's my breath or your breath.
-The only thing that could upset that is breath?
-Oh, my goodness! Please, I'm not kidding.
I can -- No. Oh, my God!
-Oh, my God. Please get him away.
Are you sure, Kevin? Are you sure?
Dude, that was the scariest thing
that ever happened in my lifetime!
What is wrong with you?! Gaah!
-I started yelling, y'all didn't look at Jimmy's face.
-What else did you bring? You have one more.
I'm just gonna put her away. [ Laughter ]
You said, "Take it, take it, take it, take it, take it!"
-All right, what do we got? What do we got?
What are we doing? -What you got?
-So, for this last animal, we're all gonna come down here.
We're gonna join you down here. -Well, I'mma go up here.
-I'mma go up here. -No, all right, come on.
It's gonna be fine. This'll be fine, here we go.
-I don't like nothing standing behind me.
I promise you, this one will be awesome.
He's actually got a very cute name.
It's Squire. And Squire is a falcon.
All right, so come on out, Squire.
-They are beautiful birds. They really are.
-You know what birds like? Small objects.
They've got really strong talons, those killing claws.
That's what they use to actually hunt their prey.
They're really quick, they're keyed in to movement.
So, what I want to do with this one --
So I'm thinking, if you two want to go up into the audience
and we'll get this one flying to you.
[ Cheers and applause ] Does that sound good?
-I'll head up this side. -You go up that one?
-Gonna put it down to your side to start...
-Okay. So, what we're gonna do is,
I'm gonna call him over, and once he's ready,
Make sure you don't put your hands up, though,
-Jimmy, I saw this in a movie. -Kevin, put your --
Hey, look over there, Squire. It's Jimmy.
There you go. Ooh, he's on you now.
So, what we're gonna do, we're gonna keep this
nice and still just like that. Just like that.
So just keep that one still. [ Laughter and applause ]
We'll be right back. Stick around, everybody.
-Y'all got to get it, Jimmy. [ Cheers and applause ]
